meta.description: Language labels for backend module Migrate Multicolumn to Gridelements belonging to extension 'brainmulticolumntogridelements'

languageKey.label: Migrate Multicolumn to Gridelements
Migrates multicolumn containers to gridelements containers (including their contents)
Migriere Multicolumn nach Gridelements
Wandelt Multicolumn-Inhaltselemente in Gridelements-Inhaltselemente um (mitsamt Inhalt)
